MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL53 postcode area of Abersoch. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:45am to carry out repairs to broken equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:38am on 19th November
